both_avatar_and_image: Choose either avatar or upload image, not both.
no_avatar_or_image: You must choose avatar or upload image.

coupon.not_available_for_store: Coupon is not available for this store

receiver_required: Receiver name and phone are required for non-registered users

loyalty_offer.end_date_past: Offer end date cannot be in the past

offer.categories_required: You must send the category list for the offer
offer.offer_not_belong_to_store: Offer does not belong to this store

offer.discount_percentage_required: discountPercentage is required and must be between 1 and 100

orders.min_points_required: You must have at least 500 points to use points for payment
orders.points_exceed_balance: Used points exceed your available balance

orders.scheduled_expired_payment: Cannot proceed with payment, scheduled time has expired
orders.pickup_required: Pickup by customer or another person must be specified
orders.pickup_self_no_other: You cannot enter another person's info if pickup is by the customer
orders.pickup_person_required: You must provide the name and number of the person who will pick up the order
orders.car_required: Car ID is required for drive-thru pickup
orders.store_closed_scheduled: Store is closed at the scheduled time
orders.store_closed_now: Store is currently closed and cannot accept orders
orders.points_greater_than_total: Points used exceed the total order amount
orders.points_insufficient: Insufficient points, the payment has been refunded to the customer
orders.expired_order_refund: The order has expired, the payment has been refunded to the customer
orders.not_paid: Order is not paid, no refund needed
orders.invalid_status_for_refund: Order cannot be cancelled unless in CUSTOMER_DECISION state
orders.invalid_status_for_reject: Order cannot be rejected in the current status
orders.invalid_status_for_ready: Cannot mark order as ready in the current status
orders.invalid_status_for_arrived: Order must be READY to mark as ARRIVED
orders.invalid_status_for_received: Order must be ARRIVED to mark as RECEIVED
orders.invalid_status_for_extend: Order is not in customer decision state
